notes: Large 3BR/2BA unit on 10F/15F in an elevator building with gym and parking included. Move-in ready with appliances (fridge, washer, AC, water heater), furnished with bed/wardrobe/sofa, cooking allowed with natural gas, and pets permitted. Modernity uncertain without interior photos, but building amenities (gym, flat parking) suggest a relatively modern complex. Management fee of NT$4,200/month is additional. Excellent dual-MRT access is very convenient for a growing family.
